anemia.description: Anemia is a condition in which you lack enough healthy red blood cells to carry adequate oxygen to your body's tissues.
anemia.treatment: Treatment for anemia depends on the cause.
anemia.medication: Iron supplements, Vitamin B12 injections, and Folic acid supplements.

diabetes.description: Diabetes is a disease that occurs when your blood glucose, also called blood sugar, is too high.
diabetes.treatment: Healthy eating, regular exercise, and blood sugar monitoring.
diabetes.medication: Insulin therapy, Metformin, and other oral medications.
